articles.author: Rohan Nadkarni
articles.title: How the Pacers pulled off a comeback never seen before in NBA history - NBC News
articles.description: Game 1 of the 2025 Eastern Conference finals between the Indiana Pacers and the New York Knicks will be remembered by basketball fans for a long time after one of the most unbelievable comebacks in NBA history.
